text: Tamen wen ni fuhuo de shijian he shi cai shixian? Ni [dui tamen] shuo:“Wei wo de zhu zhidao zhege zhishi [zhu], wei ta caineng xuanbu ta he shi shixian. Ta zai tiandi jian shi jian dashi, ta jiang turan jianglin nimen.” Tamen wen ni, haoxiang ni dui ci hen liaojie shi de. Ni shuo:“Wei an la zhidao zhege zhishi, dan da duoshu ren bing bu zhidao.”
